title: Mohale hits back at troll who accused him of never buying Somizi gifts
text:
Mohale hits back at troll who accused him of never buying Somizi gifts share this

Cape Town - It is no secret that Somizi is quite the romantic when it comes to buying gifts for his husband Mohale.

From booking him a trip to New York (which ended up being to Italy) for his birthday to getting him 100 roses to celebrate 100 hours of their marriage, Somgaga goes all out.

READ MORE: Somizi gifts Mohale with a trip to New York!

While many may find this super sweet, one troll had a different opinion and took to Twitter to tell Mohale that it would be nice to see him gifting Somizi for a change.

“I would really love to see you do the same for him. I pray your marriage works yazi,” the troll responded to a post where Mohale had shared how Somizi got him 100 roses.
